txt.en: The organized Wargs of Maudhul-ulur remain a great threat to the Elves of the Malledhrim.

'In the end, I believe the only way to truly reduce the threat of the Wargs is to defeat their leader. Cut off the head, and the serpent will die.

'Amid the Wargs of Maudhul-ulur, there is a Warg-rider who leads them all. Defeat Âthruk and his beast, and the Wargs will surely be thrown into disarray.

'Return to me when your task is done, and I will reward you as best I can.'
Âthruk can be found at Maudhul-ulur, south from Echad Glamodúd.\n\nGoldínwen has asked you to defeat Âthruk, the overseer of Maudhul-ulur.
'Excellent work, [placeholder]! The Wargs of Maudhul-ulur will surely fear us now.\n\n'You have earned this reward and the gratitude of the Malledhrim.'
Goldínwen is at Echad Glamodúd, north from Maudhul-ulur.\n\nYou should return to Goldínwen with news of your victory.
'Âthruk still lives? That is ill news. He must be slain, or the Wargs remain a threat.'
'The hounds of Dol Guldur have been muzzled at Maudhul-ulur, thanks to you, [placeholder].'
'The Wargs of the Mirk-eaves will fear the Malledhrim.'
Talk to Goldínwen at Echad Glamodúd
